description: The president of Spina di Rosula, Navia is a powerful Geo claymore user from Fontaine who excels at dealing AoE Geo damage and supporting her team with Crystallize reactions.

artifacts.name: Nighttime Whispers in the Echoing Woods (4)

talents: As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute
info: Navia is a Geo DPS who excels at AoE damage and benefits from Crystallize reactions. Build her for CRIT, ATK%, and Geo DMG Bonus.

artifacts.name: Nighttime Whispers in the Echoing Woods (4)

skills.name: Normal Attack: Blunt Refusal
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 consecutive claymore strikes.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive claymore strikes.
Charged Attack
Drains stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks. At the end, performs a more powerful slash.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Ceremonial Crystalshot
skills.desc: Navia fires a powerful Geo shell, dealing AoE Geo DMG. The skill's power increases with the number of Crystal Shrapnel stacks consumed.
skills.details_html:
Ceremonial Crystalshot
Fires a Geo shell, dealing AoE Geo DMG. Consumes Crystal Shrapnel stacks to increase damage.

skills.name: As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute
skills.desc: Navia launches a barrage of Geo shells, dealing massive AoE Geo DMG and granting herself and nearby allies increased CRIT Rate.
skills.details_html:
As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute
Launches a barrage of Geo shells, dealing massive AoE Geo DMG and increasing CRIT Rate for Navia and nearby allies.

passive_talents.name: Rosula's Command
passive_talents.desc: After using Ceremonial Crystalshot, Navia's ATK is increased by 20% for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Geo's Embrace
passive_talents.desc: When Navia picks up a Crystallize shard, her Geo DMG Bonus is increased by 15% for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Fontaine's Finest
passive_talents.desc: When Navia is in the party, the chance to obtain double weapon ascension materials is increased by 10%.

constellations.name: Second Salvo
constellations.desc: When Navia uses her Burst, she instantly gains 3 Crystal Shrapnel stacks.

constellations.name: Third Salvo
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Ceremonial Crystalshot by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Fourth Salvo
constellations.desc: When Navia picks up a Crystallize shard, her CRIT Rate is increased by 10% for 10s.

constellations.name: Fifth Salvo
constellations.desc: Increases the level of As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Final Salvo
constellations.desc: After using Ceremonial Crystalshot, Navia's next Normal Attack deals an additional 50% Geo DMG.
